official_title: A bill to designate the Charles Nagel Station of the United States Postal Service in St. Louis, Missouri, as the "Frederick N. Weathers Station of the United States Postal Service".

summary.text: Renames the Charles Nagel Station of the U.S. Postal Service in St. Louis, Missouri, the Frederick N. Weathers Station of the U.S. Postal Service.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Charles Nagel Station of the United States Postal Service in St. Louis, Missouri, as the "Frederick N. Weathers Station of the United States Postal Service".
